main: S1 and S2 {status:Discard} skills to set {status:KnowledgeExplored} to whatever rank the discarded skill was. S1 gets clash Power, and S2 and S3 get bonus damage and {status:Sinking} application depending on the value.

Gains {status:KnowledgeTraining} on his S1 and S2 (S2 also grants it to allies), which gives shields and clash power when discarding skills. It's reduced when taking damage and completely expires when staggered. His passive also gives himself and his allies {status:KnowledgeTraining} when an ally discards a skill (and gives him damage up).

S3 consumes all his {status:KnowledgeTraining} to temporarily grant him additional {status:KnowledgeExplored}, increasing its damage and {status:Sinking} application. At the end of the skill, it automatically resets to 1 (or 3 if the skill kills its target) if it ended up being 4 or higher.
other: S1 gives some shields if ever it's discarded.

Use the discard trick if you want to maintain his {status:KnowledgeExplored} level. Generate his defense skill, then use the upper skill (the one that wasn't replaced by the defense skill). This stops him from discarding any skills.
